messages.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_ISO:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> <@REGEXP("ossec"):daemon@>: <@REGEXP("Alert Level: \d+;"):level@> <@REGEXP("Rule: \d+ -"):module@> <@REGEXP("Ossec server started.; Location: .+ ossec: Ossec started."):msg@>

name: OSSEC
description: Open Source Security Host-Based Intrusion Detection System
